inputs.name: targetFiles
inputs.label: Target Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The script files to check. Yes you can use globs!

inputs.name: followSourcedFiles
inputs.label: Follow Sourced Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this to follow all sourced includes. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/Integration#decide-whether-you-want-to-follow-sourced-files-that-are-not-specified-as-input) for more information

inputs.name: checkSourcedFiles
inputs.label: Check Sourced Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check sourced files. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/blob/master/shellcheck.1.md#options) for more information

inputs.name: ignoredErrorCodes
inputs.label: Error Codes To Ignore
inputs.helpMarkDown: List the ShellCheck error codes you want to ignore (i.e. SC2059), with one error code per line. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/Ignore#ignoring-errors) for more information

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the output format. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/blob/master/shellcheck.1.md#formats) for more information

inputs.name: shellDialect
inputs.label: Shell Dialect
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the shell dialect. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/Integration#decide-whether-you-want-to-specify-a-shell-dialect) for more information

inputs.name: useRcFiles
inputs.label: Utilize shellcheckrc files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Look for and use .shellcheckrc files. See the [docs](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/blob/master/shellcheck.1.md#rc-files) for more information
